resources.string: The idea is to make the music app for soundtracks from movies, cartoons etc. \nMain page - one of two fragments. \nHere are 4 main categories - clickable ImageViews, with the usage of explicit intent.
In this Fragment user will have only favorite songs. By clicking on the heart button in the music player, the song will be stored here.

ListView is used for page with list of items of chosen category. Inside this list all the items are clickable. 
On the next page there is the ListView of all the songs that are belongs to the film/series/cartoon/anime. 
Both activities have the backup navigation. 
The Search will be implemented inside the app, so user can find a song, an artist or a particular film.

For implementing MediaPlayer ExoPlayer library is needed.
 Here is the cover image or image by default.
 Pause, start, forward, back buttons will be implemented.
 On the bottom will be a button that open a menu with songs from the category, favorite button and shuffle.
